name: Terible Tower-Defense
description:
It's a prototype, i did, jost for sake of finally doing something.

Thre are 5 turrets, and 6 enemies currently.

Turret namePriceUsageMashine Gun turret100Kills enemiesAnti-Bullet turret75Destroys enemy bullets mid-flightDummy turret50Distract enemies, that want's to destroy the coreCoreFree, one per gameWhen destroyed, game over. Generates money.Sniper Turret120Kills enemies. Deals masive damage, but it's slowMining turret200Can be placed only in red zones. Sent's energy to the core, witch adds money

I would greatly appreciate any feedback.
